summary: A configuration container that defines all architectural hyper‑parameters for a Pix2Struct vision transformer, such as hidden dimensions, number of layers and heads, patch embedding size, activation, normalization, dropout rates, initialization settings and maximum sequence length.
business_intent: Enables developers to instantiate and tailor Pix2Struct vision models for image‑to‑structured‑data tasks by centralizing model architecture choices and supporting loading of compatible pretrained checkpoints.
